channel.title: Tau Cannon gone missing
channel.description: I picked up the Tau Cannon, and used it a bit, but sometime in between the battle at the end of Questionable Ethics and the dam in Surface Tension, it is no longer in my inventory.

item.title: Tau Cannon gone missing
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
give weapon_tau

known bug when moving from the first map of surface tension to the last map of QE

item.title: Tau Cannon gone missing

item.description:
I picked up the Tau Cannon, and used it a bit, but sometime in between the battle at the end of Questionable Ethics and the dam in Surface Tension, it is no longer in my inventory.
